Docs.summary: A standard view controller that connects the application to a number of standard services such as social networks, SMS, etc.

remarks.para: The allows the application user to easily share data between the current application and services. A number of services such as social networks, email, and SMS are provided by the OS. The application developer can create additional services by implementing custom s and . Custom activities are not available in other applications.
